title: Bug 10022: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if a build is not necessary.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled if a build is necessary.
SR: To reproduce, open the Java perspective and check if the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled, regardless of whether a build is needed or not.
